mdRecord.dcterms:description: Chair built into staircase; mortise-and-tenon joint with an extended tenon pegged on the protruding end

located in the Germantown neighborhood of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. It is a three-story, rubble schist and shingle dwelling in the Shingle style. It has a gambrel roof. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sally_Watson_House [work]
